author: Staff Reporter
text: The Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority on Saturday settled over 13 thousand cases valued about Rs. 115.76 crore through a State-level Lok Adalat. The adalats were organised in view of a national-level Lok Adalat call issued by the National Legal Services Authority. According to a release, over one lakh cases were taken up for hearing, out of which 13, 937 were settled by Saturday evening.
title: Over 13, 000 cases settled through Lok Adalat
